title: One Of Us Wants A Lesson About Drastic Forgiveness?!
description:
Bert is always fascinated when he hears about extreme cases of forgiveness. He's never been the type to easily forgive those who have wronged him, but today he wants to understand. So what was the craziest thing you've ever forgiven someone for.
